summary: The Department of Defense requested over $15 billion for its military construction program in FY 2025. Projects include child development centers, hangars, and more. Over the last 5 years, poor initial planning contributed to about 25% of the projects being delayed for at least a year. Our recommendations are to help DOD address this issue and others we found in our review. For example, if...
title: Military Construction: Better Information Sharing Would Improve DOD's Oversight
